reg_pit.title: Property Transfer Tax Exemption Regulation No. 8

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 68/2017, effective March 1, 2017.

reg:regulation.reg:title: Property Transfer Tax Exemption Regulation No. 8

bcl:section.bcl:text: The property described below is exempt from property transfer tax for transactions required to transfer the title to the College of Registered Nurses of British Columbia:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: Certain real property at 2855 Arbutus Street, Vancouver, B.C., legally described as:

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text:
PID 013-891-685
Lot 11 except the east 17 feet now road
Block 404
District Lot 526
Plan 2300

PID 013-891-693
Lot 12
Block 404
District Lot 526
Plan 2300

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Property Transfer Tax Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 378, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 37 (2) (b)]
